nodes.text: Battle of the Thustra system  (Mandalorian Wars)

A battle occurred in the Thustra system during the Mandalorian Wars. In 3963 BBY, the Mandalorians began their full invasion of Galactic Republic territory, pressing out from their victory during the First Battle of Taris. One of the prongs of their assault sent them through Thustra.
The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It was marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
